body_html:
Hi there,

Fixed the origina issue but now crashes later (in a part of code that looks like using mkl concat):

AbortedError (see above for traceback): Operation received an exception:Status: 5, message: could not initialize a memory descriptor, in file tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_conv_ops.cc:652
	 [[Node: conv1/BiasAdd = _MklConv2DWithBias[T=DT_FLOAT, _kernel="MklOp", data_format="NHWC", padding="SAME", strides=[1, 2, 2, 1], use_cudnn_on_gpu=true, _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:CPU:0"](_arg_input_1_0_0, conv1/kernel/read, conv1/bias/read, DMT/_0, DMT/_1, DMT/_2)]]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/client/session.py", line 1361, in _do_call
    return fn(*args)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/client/session.py", line 1340, in _run_fn
    target_list, status, run_metadata)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/errors_impl.py", line 516, in __exit__
    c_api.TF_GetCode(self.status.status))
tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.AbortedError: Operation received an exception:Status: 5, message: could not initialize a memory descriptor, in file tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_conv_ops.cc:652
	 [[Node: conv1/BiasAdd = _MklConv2DWithBias[T=DT_FLOAT, _kernel="MklOp", data_format="NHWC", padding="SAME", strides=[1, 2, 2, 1], use_cudnn_on_gpu=true, _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:CPU:0"](_arg_input_1_0_0, conv1/kernel/read, conv1/bias/read, DMT/_0, DMT/_1, DMT/_2)]]

body:
Hi there,

Fixed the origina issue but now crashes later (in a part of code that looks like using mkl concat):

```
AbortedError (see above for traceback): Operation received an exception:Status: 5, message: could not initialize a memory descriptor, in file tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_conv_ops.cc:652
	 [[Node: conv1/BiasAdd = _MklConv2DWithBias[T=DT_FLOAT, _kernel="MklOp", data_format="NHWC", padding="SAME", strides=[1, 2, 2, 1], use_cudnn_on_gpu=true, _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:CPU:0"](_arg_input_1_0_0, conv1/kernel/read, conv1/bias/read, DMT/_0, DMT/_1, DMT/_2)]]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/client/session.py", line 1361, in _do_call
    return fn(*args)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/client/session.py", line 1340, in _run_fn
    target_list, status, run_metadata)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/errors_impl.py", line 516, in __exit__
    c_api.TF_GetCode(self.status.status))
tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.AbortedError: Operation received an exception:Status: 5, message: could not initialize a memory descriptor, in file tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_conv_ops.cc:652
	 [[Node: conv1/BiasAdd = _MklConv2DWithBias[T=DT_FLOAT, _kernel="MklOp", data_format="NHWC", padding="SAME", strides=[1, 2, 2, 1], use_cudnn_on_gpu=true, _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:CPU:0"](_arg_input_1_0_0, conv1/kernel/read, conv1/bias/read, DMT/_0, DMT/_1, DMT/_2)]]
```
